org.apache.sysds.runtime.io

Class FrameWriterBinaryBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sysds.runtime.io.FrameWriter
      • org.apache.sysds.runtime.io.FrameWriterBinaryBlock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrameWriterBinaryBlockParallel

    public class FrameWriterBinaryBlock
extends FrameWriter
    Single-threaded frame binary block writer.

      Internal primitive to write a block-aligned row range of a frame to a single sequence file, which is used for both single- and multi-threaded writers (for consistency).
      void writeFrameToHDFS(FrameBlock src, String fname, long rlen, long clen)

      • writeBinaryBlockFrameToSequenceFile

        protected static void writeBinaryBlockFrameToSequenceFile(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                                          org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConf job,
                                                          org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                          FrameBlock src,
                                                          int blen,
                                                          int rl,
                                                          int ru)
                                                   throws IOException
        Internal primitive to write a block-aligned row range of a frame to a single sequence file, which is used for both single- and multi-threaded writers (for consistency).
        Parameters:
        path - file path
        job - job configuration
        fs - file system
        src - frame block
        blen - block length
        rl - lower row
        ru - upper row
        Throws:
        IOException - if IOException occurs
